element.label: BreastfeedingSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about current or past breastfeeding activity by an individual.

element.label: Status
element.definition: Statement about current breastfeeding status for the individual.

element.label: Comment
element.definition: Additional narrative about the breastfeeding not captured in other fields.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this tobacco breastfeeding summary was last updated.

element.label: ObstetricSummaryItem
element.definition: Summary or persistent information about the numbers of key obstetric events.

element.label: Gravidity
element.definition: Number of times a woman has been pregnant, current and past, regardless of the pregnancy outcome.

element.label: Parity
element.definition: The number of pregnancies that have resulted in a live birth or a stillbirth.

element.label: EstimatedDateDeliveryItem
element.definition: Estimated date of delivery for a pregnancy, calculated or estimated by a variety of methods.

element.label: ByCycle
element.definition: The EDD estimated from an LNMP and characteristics of the menstrual cycle.

element.label: ByUltrasound
element.definition: Details about an EDD estimated from the findings on a pregnancy ultrasound.

element.label: ScanDate
element.definition: The date on which the ultrasound was carried out.

element.label: GestationByScan
element.definition: The gestation estimated from the scan.

element.label: EDDByUltrasound
element.definition: EDD estimated from the findings on a pregnancy ultrasound.

element.label: MenstruationItem
element.definition: Details about menstrual bleeding and associated symptoms within a specified single cycle or specified group of cycles.

element.label: LNMP
element.definition: First day of menstrual bleeding in the most recent typical menstrual cycle experienced by the individual.
